GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article by id given

article.title: The Rise Of Thinking Machines: How IBM's Watson Takes On The World
article.author: jessjelly
article.body: Many people know Watson as the IBM-developed cognitive super computer that won the Jeopardy! gameshow in 2011. In truth, Watson is not actually a computer but a set of algorithms and APIs, and since winning TV fame (and a $1 million prize) IBM has put it to use tackling tough problems in every industry from healthcare to finance. Most recently, IBM has announced several new partnerships which aim to take things even further, and put its cognitive capabilities to use solving a whole new range of problems around the world.

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves all comments for a given article id

comments.body: Itaque quisquam est similique et est perspiciatis reprehenderit voluptatem autem. Voluptatem accusantium eius error adipisci quibusdam doloribus.
comments.author: tickle122

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: takes a comment body and username, posts a new comment to the database and responds with the comment

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: will update the given article with the amount of votes specified and respond with the article
